title: FT: HOF, Chase w/ rare backs
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: FT: HOF, Chase w/ rare backs
posts.post_content:
I am looking for the following backs (EPDG, Sovereign 150 & 460, and Polar Bear) with any of the following fronts:

Bender portrait
M. Brown portrait
Chase pink
Chase blue
Chesbro
Evers portrait
Johnson portrait
Lajoie bat
Lajoie portrait
Mathewson portrait
Tinker portrait
Waddell throwing
Waddell portrait
Cy Young portrait

I have the below four and cash for trade.

If you have any matches and wish to chat please shoot me a PM. I will get back to you as soon as I can.

Thank you.

Derek

Trade list: Marquard portrait, AB 350; Lajoie bat, Polar Bear (I would consider an upgrade); Keeler portrait, EPDG; Chase loving cup, Sovereign 460.
